original_title: 1988 Walt Disney World 4th of July Spectacular
overview: The 1988 Walt Disney World 4th of July Spectacular, originally aired on ABC July 3rd 1988.  It’s important to remember back in 1988, marketing of Walt Disney World and Disneyland was still separate so this wasn’t a Disney Parks presentation, but a Walt Disney World Celebration of America.
title: 1988 Walt Disney World 4th of July Spectacular
